THE CHARITABLE ENDOWMENTS ACT, 1890 1 ACT No. VI OF 1890 [7th March, 1890] An Act to provide for the Vesting and Administration of Property held in trust for charitable purposes. WHEREAS it is expedient to provide for the vesting and administration of property held in trust for charitable purposes; It is hereby enacted as follows :- 1. Title, extent and commencement.-(1) This Act may be called the Charitable Endowments Act, 1890. 2[(2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan]; and (3) It shall come into force on the first day of October, 1890. 2. Definition. In this Act, “charitable purpose” includes relief of the poor, education, medical relief and the advancement of any other object of general public utility, but does not include a purpose which relates exclusively to religious teaching or worship3. 3.
